tool_description: An api to generate random but somewhat interesting website links (use at your own risk) and facts
title: randomness

api_list.name: fact
api_list.description: Generate a random fact. More facts will be added very soon
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://randomness.p.rapidapi.com/fact"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "randomness.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: website
api_list.description: Generate one random useless but somewhat interesting website from a total of 70+ website links
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://randomness.p.rapidapi.com/website"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "randomness.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
